name: BREATHE EASY home spray
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS This blend of Eucalyptus and Lemongrass essential oils clears the air and acts as an environmental disinfectant and respiratory aid. Spray your kid’s room, spray the bathroom, spray wherever you want to breathe easy.

"As a family of asthma and allergen suffers we love using Breathe Easy in our home. The scent is clear, fresh and natural and we much prefer it to the overpowering, synthetic alternatives. 10 out of 10 and a koala stamp." Chris & Amanda, Leura NSW

name: HAPPY DAYS home spray
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

A delightful blend of essential oils, including Tangerine, Grapefruit and Jasmine. A few sprays into the middle of a room will revitalise your living space and make you smile!

"This smells like all my happiest memories combined. It really lifts my spirits." F.W., Katoomba

"I love the smell and freshness of the Paint the Sky products! I work with horses all day and there is nothing more relaxing than getting some time out, spraying some 'Happy Days' round the room - spraying my face and arms with 'Body Mist' then rubbing Paint the Sky 'Indulgence Undo' into my hands!! I just love it and feel very spoilt !!! Thanks to these products I really enjoy the time out from my demanding job!!" A.C, EA Horseriding Instructor NCAS Lev 1 & Accredited Stock Horse Coach

name: SPIDER STAY AWAY surface spray
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

This blend, containing Lavender and Eucalyptus essential oils, may be used in the car or around the house. Has been used successfully for more than four years to keep huntsman spiders out of my car!

"I love this product because it's non-toxic and smells great. It's a winner!" Jen, NSW

"After having a couple of spider incidents whilst driving, I was paranoid about getting into the car until I found the Paint The Sky Spider Stay Away Spray. I give the inside of the car a spray once a week and I haven't seen a spider since! Not only can I now drive without fear, but the car smells great too!" D.N., Sydney

name: SQUEAKY CLEAN hand wash
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS The naturally antibacterial essential oils of eucalyptus and lemongrass give a thorough clean, while the aloe vera ensures softness and moisture

"I have just returned from a 3 week campervan holiday. The Squeaky Clean handwash was our most used item on the trip: clean hands, accessible body wash to use in the ablution block and a natural fragrant aroma that permeated the van during the entire journey. Thank you for creating such a versatile, unique product." Michele N

"I love Squeaky Clean handwash as the scent of lemongrass & eucalyptus lingers long after I have washed my hands." Zoe Bourke

"Wow what a fantastic product. I love the super fresh smell left on my hands after using this hand wash. My hands never feel dry after using this lovely soap, just soft, fresh and clean!" Jen

name: REFRESH MY CAR interior spray
description: PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS A breezy blend of geranium, lemon and lavender to keep your car smelling fresh. Combat unpleasant odours from kids, pets, sports gear and food for a pleasant driving experience. Refresh your car now!

name: REFRESH ME body wash
description: PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS This combination of rebalancing and uplifting essential oils will give you energy for the day ahead, while the moisturising action of aloe vera and panthenol leaves your skin feeling soft as well as clean.

name: SWEET DREAMS bubble bath
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS Aloe vera and jojoba oil soothe your body. Lavender and chamomile essential oils soothe your mind. Perfect for babies and children, or anyone who needs a good night’s sleep.

"The bubble bath and baby oil are fantastic. This is my fourth baby and I have been trying various baby products for the last 10 years and these products are the best I have ever seen. It is such a great opportunity to support a quality home based business as well." Casandra, Sydney

"I enjoy using Sweet Dreams bubble bath to wash the kids at the end of the day. The scents of lavender and chamomile relax not only the kids but the rest of the family too." Tony, Katoomba

"I love a warm bubble bath, but wanted to avoid artificial ingredients. Sweet Dreams bubble bath has a very relaxing scent and produces heaps of bubbles!" C.H., Sydney

name: RELAX ME face & body mist
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

A calming spray, containing Lavender, Chamomile and Petitgrain essential oils, to soothe your skin and your mind.

PRODUCT REVIEWS

"The quality of the oils are not like any other that I have ever tried. This really is a superior product!" Freedom, NSW

"I absolutely love the 'Relax me face and body mist' I have found it so refreshing, especially when it has been so hot. I keep it in the fridge and spray over my face when I come indoors." Nicole, Sydney

"Refresh Me and Relax Me – face and body mists -  I have used both sprays and LOVE them both. I carry them with me everywhere. They are great on long car trips. Fantastic combination and quality of essential oils used." Monique, NSW

name: REFRESH ME face & body mist
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

A revitalising moisture mist, containing Geranium and Grapefuit essential oils, to energise your skin and your mind. Keep in the refrigerator and spray onto face and body for the coolest refreshment.

"Refresh Me and Relax Me – face and body mists -  I have used both sprays and LOVE them both. I carry them with me everywhere. They are great on long car trips. Fantastic combination and quality of essential oils used." Monique, NSW

"The Refresh Me face and body mist is light and fresh and the perfect antidote to a long hard day at work! Perfect for hot summer days and leaves your skin feeling good as new!!" Laura, Sydney

"I just wanted to write and let you know how much I love the 'refresh me' spray I got before Christmas last year. With my own business and a little toddler, sometimes in the late afternoon I feel like another coffee! But I just give myself a little burst of your spray and I feel it gives me the natural pick me up I need without the sleepless nights that come with the caffeine." Ann, Katoomba

"A friend bought me your Refresh Me face & body mist,  I love it so much I actually use it as a bedroom spray.  Every night before I go to be I spray my room, it gives me such a fresh calming feeling. I love it.  Even my husband looks forward to me spraying our room at night!!" Gabriella, Melbourne

name: NIT REPEL kid’s hair mist
description: PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS Spray this onto your kid’s hair before they go off to school to discourage creepies crawling onto their heads! Contains Tea Tree, Lavender and Chamomile essential oils Note: This does not treat nits, it aims to prevent them. "I use this hair mist on my son every day before preschool. So far, no nits! It also helps to moisten and untangle his hair, making it easier to comb." D.H., Wentworth Falls "We bought this spray and I must say it makes me feel so relieved to know we are fighting off head lice BEFORE they become a problem and have been thinking of suggesting to our daughter's daycare that every daycare in Australia should have your natural preventative sprays. I wish we had them when we were kids. Thanks for your creative and thoughtful products that are different, fresh and unlike what everyone else is offering.With Thanks" Ann & Steve, Katoomba

name: INDULGENCE UNDO detoxing body & massage oil
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

This blend of essential oils, including Juniper, Cypress and Lemongrass, may help in the detoxification of your lymphatic and digestive systems. Use to massage your lumpy bits, or just to moisturise your body after too much indulgence.

CAUTION Contains nut oil (sweet almond oil) as a carrier oil. Contains juniper essential oil which should be avoided during pregnancy.

"I would have no problem in recommending your Indulgence Undo oil. It has an amazing 'natural' aroma. I put it on my neck when I am stressed and its has a wonderful calming effect. I highly recommend it." Amanda, QLD

"I was so happy to receive my birthday gift of the detox blend of essential oils.  I love the product and am honoured to be associated with Paint the Sky.  It feels beautiful on the skin and has a delightful fragrance.  I believe nothing is more effective than essential oils.  Best wishes to Kellie – the sky is the limit!" Bernie, NSW

name: LET’S GET IT ON romantic body & massage oil
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

A sensual blend containing Sweet Orange, Patchouli and Ylang Ylang essential oils. Perfect to moisturise your body after a bath, or use to massage someone you love.

CAUTION Contains nut oil (sweet almond oil) as a carrier oil. Contains cedarwood and jasmine essential oils which should be avoided during pregnancy.

"Oh my God!" F.W., Katoomba

"A massage from my partner with this oil is a great way to enjoy a romantic evening together." David, NSW

name: RUB-A-DUB BUB baby massage oil
description:
PLEASE EMAIL paint@paintthesky.com.au FOR ALL ORDERS

This soothing mix of chamomile, lavender and jasmine is the perfect way to say goodbye to the day and welcome the night. Lovely for baby, and also great to use as a foot rub for mum! Richly moisturising avocado and apricot kernel oils are used as carriers, therefore contains no nut oils which baby may be sensitive to.

CAUTION Contains Jasmine essential oil, which some aromatherapists recommend avoiding during pregnancy.

"I was given a bottle of Rub-a-Dub-Bub when I was pregnant with our second child. Not having embraced the whole after bath massage thing with our first, I was slightly skeptical. Now I wish could go back in time and do it over. Our new baby settles so much easier of an evening in comparision to our first and I'm convinced that our Rub-a-Dub-Bub routine is to thank.  We like to add a few drops to her bath and then finish with a tummy rub. The bonus is that our very enthusiastic big sister now likes a massage before she goes to bed, so everyone is sleeping better all round - Mum and Dad included!" K.M., Leura

"The bubble bath and baby oil are fantastic. This is my fourth baby and I have been trying various baby products for the last 10 years and these products are the best I have ever seen. It is such a great opportunity to support a quality home based business as well." Casandra, Sydney
